entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
